repositories.author: do-know
repositories.name: Crypt-LE
repositories.description: Crypt::LE - Let's Encrypt client and library in Perl for obtaining free SSL certificates (inc. generating RSA/ECC keys and CSRs). HTTP/DNS verification is supported out of the box, easily extended with plugins, easily dockerized.
